title: ASAP!!!! Can I please get some assistance I am being hacked, and I don't want to lose my acc.
body: They have already changed my password once and I have now changed it total of 3 times so far with them finding my password 2 times. I have run 2 different security programs to see if there was possibly a key logger of some sort, and I have came up with nothing. Please hurry and respond I don't want this account that I have invested time in to be simply hacked. I already have sent a ticket, but taking to long for something this urgent.

replies.body:
There's a pretty good chance that the hacker also has access to your email where the password resets are going O_O!

I can't do a whole lot for account security here on the boards, but I did pull up your account and saw something a little fishy. Rest assured that your account is going to be kept safe for the time being, and know that you'll be able to get your account back safe and sound in your ticket!
Can you please help me. I DID purchase rp yesterday that I didn't use, before this all happened. Any information will be appreciated.
My pass changed as well, and I cannot check the email because it was an old one made years ago.
I have checked my email and it has said nobody was on it besides the time I went to check it
